meanings.sent1: The exultations of the crowd could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent2: Her face lit up with exultations when she received the good news.
meanings.sent3: The exultations of the puppy upon seeing its owner were truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The exultations of nature after a long winter are a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The exultations of the children playing in the park echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A feeling of great joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: The exultations in her heart were evident in her smile.
meanings.sent2: The exultations of winning the championship were overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The exultations of finding a dollar in an old jacket pocket made his day.
meanings.sent4: The exultations of a successful surprise party filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The exultations of a beautiful sunrise never fail to inspire awe.
